_description: Perfect Database training configuration for NNUE PyTorch
_use_case: Training with Perfect Database generated optimal training data
_features: Supports both NineMill and NineMill^ (factorized) features

_usage_instructions.step_1: Update perfect_db.database_path to your Perfect Database directory
_usage_instructions.step_2: Generate training data: python generate_training_data.py --perfect-db /path/to/db --output perfect_db_training_data.txt --positions 50000 --symmetries
_usage_instructions.step_3: Generate validation data: python generate_training_data.py --perfect-db /path/to/db --output perfect_db_validation_data.txt --positions 5000
_usage_instructions.step_4: Train model: python train.py perfect_db_training_data.txt --validation-data perfect_db_validation_data.txt --features NineMill --batch-size 8192 --max_epochs 400

NineMill.description: Basic feature set with position-piece encoding

NineMill^.description: Factorized features with enhanced learning capabilities

_symmetry_benefits.data_augmentation: 16x more training examples from same base positions
_symmetry_benefits.efficiency: More training data without additional Perfect DB queries
_symmetry_benefits.note: Increases memory usage and training time proportionally
